name: VR Escape from Sorcerer's Lair
description:
Escape from a magical castle full of puzzles and magic potions! 

This is a fantasy escape game for Google Cardboard where you get to explore a sorcerer's castle in order to find your way out of it.

It may sound simple, but it is not!

The first 3 levels are waiting for you. If you have an Android device and a Cardboard viewer, just give them a try!

Good luck!
